Writing - Blog Post.en: Write a blog post about [topic]. Target audience: [audience]. Word count: [e.g., 800].
Writing - Blog Post.id: Tulis artikel blog tentang [topik]. Target pembaca: [audiens]. Jumlah kata: [misal, 800].

Coding - Optimize.en: Optimize my code for better performance. Target language: [language]. Constraints: [e.g., memory, speed].
Coding - Optimize.id: Optimalkan kode saya untuk performa lebih baik. Bahasa target: [bahasa]. Batasan: [misal, memori, kecepatan].

Writing - Email.en: Write a professional email to [recipient] about [subject]. Tone: [formal/casual]. Key points: [list].
Writing - Email.id: Tulis email profesional kepada [penerima] tentang [subjek]. Nada: [formal/kasual]. Poin utama: [daftar].

Learning - Explanation.en: Explain [complex topic] in simple terms for beginners. Use analogies and examples from [field, e.g., robotics].
Learning - Explanation.id: Jelaskan [topik kompleks] dengan bahasa sederhana untuk pemula. Gunakan analogi dan contoh dari [bidang, misal, robotika].

Creative - Story.en: Write a short story about [topic]. Genre: [genre]. Length: [short/medium]. Twist: [optional twist].
Creative - Story.id: Tulis cerita pendek tentang [topik]. Genre: [genre]. Panjang: [pendek/sedang]. Twist: [twist opsional].

AI - Prompt Engineering.en: Create 5 optimized prompts for generating [content type] about [topic]. Include variations for [styles, e.g., detailed/concise].
AI - Prompt Engineering.id: Buat 5 prompt yang dioptimalkan untuk menghasilkan [jenis konten] tentang [topik]. Sertakan variasi untuk [gaya, misal, detail/ringkas].

Robotics - Code Snippet.en: Generate Arduino/C++ code for [robot task, e.g., servo control with Dynamixel]. Hardware: [e.g., ESP32]. Features: [list].
Robotics - Code Snippet.id: Buat kode Arduino/C++ untuk [tugas robot, misal, kontrol servo dengan Dynamixel]. Hardware: [misal, ESP32]. Fitur: [daftar].

ML - Model Idea.en: Suggest a machine learning project for [problem, e.g., TB disease prediction]. Dataset: [source]. Tools: [e.g., TensorFlow, GCP]. Steps: [high-level].
ML - Model Idea.id: Sarankan proyek machine learning untuk [masalah, misal, prediksi penyakit TB]. Dataset: [sumber]. Tools: [misal, TensorFlow, GCP]. Langkah: [garis besar].

Web Dev - Component.en: Write React/Next.js code for a [UI component, e.g., responsive dashboard]. Features: [e.g., dark mode, API fetch]. Style: [e.g., Tailwind].
Web Dev - Component.id: Tulis kode React/Next.js untuk [komponen UI, misal, dashboard responsif]. Fitur: [misal, dark mode, API fetch]. Style: [misal, Tailwind].
